title: How to See Who You Blocked on Twitter

steps.title: Open X's settings.
steps.content: Open X's settings. Log in to https://www.twitter.com . Then, click More in left column and select Settings and Support > Settings and privacy .

steps.title: Navigate to Privacy and safety.
steps.content: Navigate to Privacy and safety . Select the Privacy and safety section of your Settings from the list.

steps.title: Select Mute and block.
steps.content: Select Mute and block . It is represented by a mute icon.

steps.title: Click Blocked Accounts.
steps.content: Click Blocked Accounts . It's in the side panel toward the bottom. This shows you a list of everyone you've blocked on X. [1] X Research source It's towards the bottom.

steps.title: Tap the profile icon from the top menu.
steps.content: Tap the profile icon from the top menu. You'll see this at the top of the X app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.

steps.title: Tap Blocked accounts under "Safety".
steps.content: Tap Blocked accounts under "Safety". Now you'll see a list of everyone you've blocked on Twitter (X).

steps.title: Open X's settings.
steps.content: Open X's settings. Click More in the column on the left-hand side of the page, and select Settings and Support > Settings and privacy .

steps.title: Navigate to Privacy and safety.
steps.content: Navigate to Privacy and safety . Select the Privacy and safety section of your Settings from the list.

steps.title: Select Mute and block.
steps.content: Select Mute and block . It is represented by a mute icon.

steps.title: Click Blocked Accounts on the left.
steps.content: Click Blocked Accounts on the left. This expands a list of everyone you've blocked on Twitter. [2] X Research source
